title: EP 14: Christian Schabacker - A Father And Son Discussion On Entrepreneurial Life
description:
How you grow up and what environment you’re exposed to during your formative years can play a significant role in – ‘who you become’. Christian had a run of good luck with an upbringing in an entrepreneurial family. Seeing his Dad chasing his dreams and progressing always motivated him “to keep trying as you never know where it's going to lead you in the end.”

Christian Schabacker is Steve’s son and currently a full-time police officer that he always wanted to be. Growing up with an entrepreneurial Dad, Christian learned to be relentless as he says to his father: “See, you succeed makes me want to succeed even more.” At only 22 years old, he has come a long way, but that’s not an end to the path of his dreams. Eventually, he wants to start his own company or some side hustle to be “his own Boss”, and build a financially better future for himself and his family.

In this very special episode of the Tactical Entrepreneur Podcast, the father-son duo engage in a fascinating conversation by having a few laughs and some serious stuff that genuinely touches you with their authentic revelations. Christian lets out what life skills he developed, having been raised in an entrepreneurial family, how he feels about achieving his long-desired goal, what his future dreams are, and so much more. The father and the son made it all happen in their lives, believing “ anything’s possible” if only you are willing, and they are all set to instill the same in you.

 

What you will learn:

  • How Steve has been a constant motivation for Christian in his growing years.
  • What traits do you find in common between working as an entrepreneur and as a cop that Cristian always feels inspired about.
  • What sets Cristian apart from guys of his age.
  • Why Christian stresses prioritizing family time.
  • And many more interesting facts!

 

Favorite Quote:

“The biggest piece of wisdom I can think of is, trusting your gut. That’s what is going to steer you in the right direction. Even if it steers you in the wrong direction, what I've realized is you will learn more than you ever could.”

-          Christian Schabacker

 

Connect with Christian:

Find Christian on Facebook here

 

How to Get Involved:

Steve Schabacker is the co-founder of Sheepdog Firearms and an entrepreneur, bestselling author, and marketer. Between his business and his content, Steve is educating firearm owners and armed professionals and setting a new standard for shops and training centers in the industry.

You can visit Sheepdog Firearms online or reach out directly to Steve at sschabacker@outlook.com.

Check out this podcast on Apple Podcasts - don’t forget to subscribe, rate, and review!
